EditorData.stateContext: Doesn't necessarily play on seeing boat. Wulbren could use this line without freeing the tieflings or after freeing the tieflings, for instance.
Guards have sounded the alarm. The prisoners hear this.
If a character was on the way to the boat and couldn't leave because of various reasons,

Text.Value: Let's not push our luck any further - we should move.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Text.Value: The Absolute be damned, I'll make it! I will!

EditorData.NodeContext: determined and hopeful - run through all of moonrise and just arrived outside (character is about to teleport out of sight)

EditorData.stateContext: IN COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under a LOT of stress.
IN COMBAT. One person signals that they have to defend the boat.

EditorData.NodeContext: an alarm has just started blaring, knows guards will arrive any moment
looking around, frantic but trying to keep her cool

Text.Value: Let's just get on the boat, and go.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Text.Value: Shit. Shit. This thing is chained up - hold them off!

EditorData.NodeContext: gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic
yelling to the player/her fellow prisoners as she runs for her life
Panicked - player is in the middle of combat holding off the guards as she flees with the other prisoners

Text.Value: The boat! Get to the damn boat!

EditorData.NodeContext: sees a way out, frantically running for it and yelling encouragement to other prisoners

EditorData.stateContext: Character is about to disappear out of sight outside the tower, past the docks area.
OUT OF COMBAT. Another character is nearby and this character is idling by.

EditorData.NodeContext: finally tied the boat, eager to leave
EditorData.logicalname: LIA: Boat leaves after this line

EditorData.NodeContext: calling out to player - high tension and urgent
gritted teeth, trying to break the chains that have tied up the boat. Trying not to panic

Text.Value: I'll die before I let you near the boat. Come on!

EditorData.NodeContext: combat has begun, vicous and ready to fight to the death

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Is preparing boat for departure. Under stress.

EditorData.NodeContext: running for her life, trying to escape cultists

EditorData.stateContext: OUT OF COMBAT. Running for their life to whatever escape point they may reach. It could be the boat, it could be the pier outside.

Text.Value: What are these chains made of?! Argh.

EditorData.NodeContext: struggling to break the chains that have tied up the boat (no guarantee of what she'll be using, either barehands or a discovered weapon)

Text.Value: We can't wait - get to the boat, or we leave without you!

EditorData.NodeContext: about to leave without the player (who is in combat)

Text.Value: Bloody thing is chained up, hang on.

EditorData.NodeContext: struggling to break the chains that have tied up the boat (no guarantee of what she'll be using, either barehands or a discovered weapon)
leaving without the player, broken hearted and filled with regret

Text.Value: I need to leave this stinking hellspit. Now.

EditorData.NodeContext: tense  - waiting by the boat and safe for now, but that could change at a moment's notice

Synopsis: Collection of solo ADs used by character during the Jailbreak escape in Moonrise Towers. This is a high stress and tense situation as this character tries to flee murderous cultists.
